summary:
The most memeable memecoin in existence! - The dogs have had their day, it's time for Mini Pepe to take reign

 About - Mini Pepe is tired of watching everyone play hot potato with the endless derivative ShibaCumGMElonKishuTurboAssFlokiMoon Inu coins. The Inu’s have had their day. It’s time for the most recognizable meme in the world to take his reign as king of the memes.

 How to buy？ - Create a Wallet

Download metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.io.

Get Some ETH

Have BNB in your wallet to switch to $MINIPEPE. If you don’t have any BNB, you can buy directly on metamask, transfer from another wallet, or buy on another exchange and send it to your wallet.

Go to Pancakeswap

Connect to Pancakeswap. Go to pancakeswap.finance in google chrome or on the browser inside your Metamask app. Connect your wallet. Paste the $MINIPEPE token address into pancakeswap, select Minipepe, and confirm. When Metamask prompts you for a wallet signature, sign.

Switch BNB for $MINIPEPE

Switch BNB for $MINIPEPE. We have ZERO taxes so you don’t need to worry about buying with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times of market volatility.

 Token - Token name: MINI PEPE

Ticker Symbol: $MINIPEPE

Blockchain: Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20)

Total Supply:420,690,000,000,000

 Roadmap - All jokes aside, here is a rough sketch of $minipepe path ahead. We don't want to give everything away on day 1, Expect surprises along the way;

Phase 1

PresaleLaunchCoinGecko/Coinmarketcap Listings1,000+ HoldersAirdropsGet $MINIPEPE Trending on twitter with our memetic power

Phase 2

Community Partnerships Minipepe Times digital newsletterFormation of token gated Telegram group, Pepe Palace, for holders, more details tbaCEX Listings 10,000+holders

Phase 3

Minipepe merchMinipepe AcademyMinipepe ToolsT1 Exchange Listings 100,000+ holdersMeme Takeover
proposal:
Hello MiniPepe community! 👋🐸

You know, we were just sitting around here, watching the memecoin world go by. Shiba this, Floki that... And then, out of the meme mist, we spotted you. Mini Pepe, the most memeable memecoin in existence. 

We thought, "Wow, they're really onto something. Not just another Inu in the dog park." So, we're here with an offer that's as unique as your $MINIPEPE token. 

We're a B2B tool shop and we've got a toolbox full of goodies that can help take Mini Pepe to the moon 🚀 (or wherever frogs prefer to hang out). 

From creating your own DEX based on Uniswap V2, setting up a blockchain-based lottery, to launching an EVM compatible blockchain bridge, we've got you covered. And the best part? It's all revenue share, so you don't have to pay a dime upfront. 

We also have a multicurrency crypto wallet, staking & yield farming, DAO governance, and even a launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking. 

And we promise, no frogs were harmed in the making of these tools. 🐸

Check out our demo at https://t.me/onoutdemos and let us know if you're interested. After all, it's not every day you get to rule the meme kingdom with your own B2B tools. 

P.S. We heard you're planning a Meme Takeover. Just remember, with our tools, you're not playing, you're creating. 😉
